languages.text: {n}Простолюдины перешептываются, отчаянно кивая друг другу — вы то и дело ловите направленные на вас восторженные взгляды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Простолюдины перешептываются, отчаянно кивая друг другу — вы то и дело ловите направленные на вас восторженные взгляды.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Простолюдины перешептываются, отчаянно кивая друг другу — вы то и дело ловите направленные на вас восторженные взгляды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The commoners exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

{n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}三个人窃窃私语，用力点着头。每隔一段时间，你就会注意到他们全神贯注的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}三个人窃窃私语，用力点着头。每隔一段时间，你就会注意到他们全神贯注的目光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La gente intercambia susurros, asintiendo enérgicamente. De vez en cuando, te dirigen una mirada atónita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente intercambia susurros, asintiendo enérgicamente. De vez en cuando, te dirigen una mirada atónita.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnsanlar birbirlerine baş sallayarak fısıldaşıyor. Arada sırada senden tarafa dalgınca baktıklarını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnsanlar birbirlerine baş sallayarak fısıldaşıyor. Arada sırada senden tarafa dalgınca baktıklarını fark ediyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人々はひそひそと話し、お互いに元気に頷く。時々、あなたに心を奪われている視線を感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人々はひそひそと話し、お互いに元気に頷く。時々、あなたに心を奪われている視線を感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gens échangent des murmures en hochant vigoureusement la tête. De temps en temps, un regard coule dans votre direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people exchange whispers, nodding vigorously at each other. Every now and then, you catch a rapt glance in your direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gens échangent des murmures en hochant vigoureusement la tête. De temps en temps, un regard coule dans votre direction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leute tuscheln und nicken dabei immer wieder aufgeregt. Hin und wieder werfen sie dir einen verzückten Blick zu.{/n}
